name: Animosity
description: Through claws and bullets, Red must save his friends from the angry ape menace. Procedural levels create a new experience with every play. Companion AI gives you the backup you need. Coop, Deathmatch, and Speedrun for up to 4 player split screen. Xbox controllers recommended.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: i5 or equivelent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Direct X 9 Storage: 500 MB available space
